name: AVSampleBufferRequest
desc: An object that describes a sample buffer creation request.

items.name: init(start: AVSampleCursor)
items.desc: Creates a newly allocated sample buffer request with the specified sample cursor.

items.name: enum AVSampleBufferRequest.Direction
items.desc: The modes that describe the buffer request direction.

items.name: var limitCursor: AVSampleCursor?
items.desc: The limiting position for sample loading.

items.name: var maxSampleCount: Int
items.desc: The maximum number of samples to load.

items.name: enum AVSampleBufferRequest.Mode
items.desc: The modes in which a sample buffer generator processes a request.

items.name: var overrideTime: CMTime
items.desc: The deadline for sample data and output PTS for the sample buffer.

items.name: var preferredMinSampleCount: Int
items.desc: The preferred minimum number of samples to load.
